scripts.cleanup: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || echo 'No node processes to kill'
scripts.dev:clean: npm run cleanup && timeout /t 2 /nobreak && npm run check-ports
scripts.dev: npm run dev:clean && start npm run dev:backend && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.stop: npm run cleanup && npm run check-ports
